item.title: Allegiant, Sun Country Team Up In $1.5B Merger To Take On Airline Heavyweights
item.description: Discount airlines have struggled recently amid rising competition and higher costs.

item.title: Vitalik Buterin Warns Of Three Structural Flaws Holding Back Decentralized Stablecoins
item.description: Vitalik Buterin said stablecoin designers undervalue risk and inactivity penalties.

item.title: ‘No Faith In Any Given Trade’: Peter Brandt Pushes Back On Tom Lee’s $200k Bitcoin Target
item.description: Bitcoin was trading around $90,592 on Sunday, far below the $200,000 outlook predicted by Tom Lee.
